title: Doctor Who - The Companion Chronicles 3.8 - The Prisioners Dilem
description:
Doctor Who - The Companion Chronicles 3.8 - The Prisioners Dilemma - iPod

Performed by Sophie Aldred as Ace
with Laura Doddington as Zara
(Duration: 60' Approx)

CAST:

Sophie Aldred (Ace); Laura Doddington (Zara)

SYNOPSIS:
A new adventure with the Seventh Doctor as told by his companion, Ace.

Two prisoners meet in a prison cell. Zara is searching for the segments of the Key to Time; she was only born yesterday but already sheÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s killed hundreds of people. Ace is more ambitious: she was going to kill everyone on the planet.

What have they got against the people of Erratoon? They go peaceably about their simple assignments, beneath their artificial sky. They share their meals and leisure time and they never ask questions. Are they even real?

Ace and Zara will only survive if they can trust each other. Or perhaps if they sell each other out... If not their awful punishment is to become just like everyone else.
AUTHOR: 	Simon Guerrier	DIRECTOR:	Lisa Bowerman
SOUND DESIGN:	David Darlington
	MUSIC:	David Darlington
COVER ART:	Simon Holub	NUMBER OF DISCS:	1 CD
RECORDED DATE:	16 June 2008
	RELEASE DATE:	30 January 2009

CHRONOLOGICAL PLACEMENT:

This special story is a 'cross-over' with the Key 2 Time mini-series.
